name: alimdh
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wi(wal(s0, w1), wal(s0, w2)), wal(s0, w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wal(s0, w1), wal(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), wi(wal(s0, w1), wal(s0, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wal(s0, w1), wal(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), wi(wal(s0, w1), wal(s0, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), wi(wal(s0, w1), wal(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wal(s0, w1), wal(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))

comment: Deduction form of Theorem 19.20 of [Margaris] p. 90, see ~ alim . (Contributed by NM, 4-Jan-2002.)
